title: Directions: Finding Places (Usefulness 3)
description: Traveler usefulness 3/10 phrases for the Finding Places subcategory within Directions. Includes 1 card(s).

cards.english: He has to find a bank that offers a better service.
cards.romaji: Kare wa motto sabisu no yoi ginko o mitsukeru beki da.
cards.japanese: 彼はずっとサービスのよい銀行を見つけるべきだ。
